settings.title: High Quality Bed Frame!
settings.content: Great upgrade! The Emma Powerbase was super easy to assemble, works perfectly, and it fits neatly within my current bed frame. You wouldn't even notice the powerbase at a glance in my room unless you looked hard enough!

settings.title: Keeps Me in Bed!
settings.content: I usually go to my study desk to work, but after purchasing the Emma Powerbase, it became so much easier to just work from the comfort of my bed. I even started to read books from my bed too!

settings.title: No More Snoring Problems!
settings.content: I bought the Emma Powerbase so I could read before sleeping, but my wife told me that I also stopped snoring. We googled a bit and found out that sleeping on an incline helps with snoring problems, so that's another good thing the Emma Powerbase helped with!

settings.tab_content_1:
Upgrade your sleep experience with the Emma Powerbase, designed for adjustable comfort. Complete with silent drive motors, enjoy controlled head elevation within the comfort of your home.

  • Complete head-adjustable features to improve your sleep setup
  • Silent drive motors to keep you undisturbed as you choose your preferred elevation
  • Compatible with all Emma mattresses, and the Emma Upholstered Platform
  • Comes with 12" stackable leg options to function as a standalone base, or to adjust to the height of your current bed frame
settings.tab_content_2:
Upgrade your sleep experience with the Emma Powerbase, designed for adjustable comfort. Complete with silent drive motors, enjoy controlled head elevation within the comfort of your home.

  • Budget-conscious sleepers who want to elevate their sleep quality
  • Active sleepers who like to work, read, or watch TV from their beds.

settings.title: Your most restful sleep awaits
settings.content: Our sleep experts know what it takes to sleep undisturbed. With silent drive motors, power outage protection, and gravity release technology, your good nights flow smoothly into good mornings.

settings.title: Customize your comfort
settings.content: Read in bed, relax your spine, or watch a movie! Equipped with customizable head elevation that allows you to find the perfect position, this brand-new powerbase transforms your bed into a sleep sanctuary.

settings.title: It's got all bases covered
settings.content: Engineered by sleep experts as an advanced sleep accessory, this base seamlessly works with most types of mattresses, especially with Emma mattresses!

settings.title: How do I set up the Emma Powerbase?
settings.content:
You can set up the Emma Powerbase as a stand alone base, to fit within an existing bed frame, or on top of your existing platform.

As a stand alone option, simply attach the 12" stackable legs to the bottom of the base, connect the frame to a powersource, and you're good to go!

To fit within an existing bed frame, check the height of your bed frame, and adjust the height of each stackable leg accordingly. Afterwards, remove any slats from your existing bedframe before placing the Emma Powerbase inside.

To go on top of your existing bed frame, just make sure that your current platform can support the weight of the Emma Powerbase. If it can, feel free to place it on top of your platform. Currently, our Upholstered Platform is compatible with the Emma Powerbase.

settings.title: What are the features the Emma Powerbase offers?
settings.content:
The Emma Powerbase comes with a 2 button wired remote that allow you to adjust the head of your mattress.

It also comes with power-outage protection features and silent drive motors to enable quiet adjustments to your sleep position.

settings.title: How do I take care of the Emma Powerbase?
settings.content:
- Remember to evenly distribute your weight when using your adjustable base.

- Lower your Emma Powerbase to the flat (horizontal) position in between presets and after use.

- If spills occur, you could wipe it off with a moist towel, but be careful not to wipe over any electrical components. Be sure to dry the Powerbase after cleaning.

settings.title: Are Emma mattresses compatible with adjustable bases?
settings.content: Yes they are! Our Emma mattresses are compatible with adjustable bases. For the Emma CliMax Hybrid in particular, its individually pocketed coils make it flexible enough to handle even the zero gravity position option!

settings.title: Shipping, Warranty, & Returns
settings.content:
Free Delivery

We work with UPS & FedEx to ship your Emma products straight from our warehouse to your front door.

Free Returns

Because of the complexity of the Emma Powerbase, we unfortunately do not have an ongoing trial period offer with it.

10-Year Limited Warranty

Enjoy a 10-Year Limited Manufacturer Warranty for each Emma Powerbase purchase. Of course, we've made the warranty claims process of any unsuitable items super easy. Just contact our customer service and we'll take care of the rest.

If you would like to contact us, please feel free to email our support team at support@emma-sleep.com or call them at +1-855-580-3662.
